# submenu

**Instance Property**

The submenu of the menu item.

## Declaration

```swift
var submenu: NSMenu? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default implementation of the `NSMenuItem` class raises an exception if `aSubmenu` already has a supermenu.

## Managing submenus

- **hasSubmenu**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the menu item has a submenu.
- **parent**: The menu item whose submenu contains the receiver.
